# React Navigation 7.x

> Routing and navigation for your React Native apps.

## Documentation

### Fundamentals

- [Getting started](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/getting-started)
- [Hello React Navigation](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/hello-react-navigation)
- [Moving between screens](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/navigating)
- [Passing parameters to routes](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/params)
- [Configuring the header bar](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/headers)
- [Header buttons](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/header-buttons)
- [Nesting navigators](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/nesting-navigators)
- [Navigation lifecycle](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/navigation-lifecycle)
- [Next steps](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/next-steps)

### Guides

- [Authentication flows](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/auth-flow)
- [Supporting safe areas](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/handling-safe-area)
- [Hiding tab bar in specific screens](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/hiding-tabbar-in-screens)
- [Different status bar configuration based on route](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/status-bar)
- [Opening a modal](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/modal)
- [Multiple drawers](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/multiple-drawers)
- [Screen options with nested navigators](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/screen-options-resolution)
- [Custom Android back button behavior](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/custom-android-back-button-handling)
- [Animating elements between screens](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/shared-element-transitions)
- [Preventing going back](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/preventing-going-back)
- [Call a function when focused screen changes](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/function-after-focusing-screen)
- [Navigating without the navigation prop](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/navigating-without-navigation-prop)
- [Deep linking](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/deep-linking)
- [Configuring links](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/configuring-links)
- [React Navigation on Web](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/web-support)
- [Server rendering](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/server-rendering)
- [Screen tracking for analytics](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/screen-tracking)
- [Themes](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/themes)
- [State persistence](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/state-persistence)
- [Combining static and dynamic APIs](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/combine-static-with-dynamic)
- [Writing tests](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/testing)
- [Type checking with TypeScript](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/typescript)
- [Troubleshooting](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/troubleshooting)
- [Upgrading from 6.x](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/upgrading-from-6.x)

### Navigators

- [Stack Navigator](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/stack-navigator)
- [Native Stack Navigator](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/native-stack-navigator)
- [Bottom Tabs Navigator](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/bottom-tab-navigator)
- [Native Bottom Tabs Navigator](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/native-bottom-tab-navigator)
- [Drawer Navigator](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/drawer-navigator)
- [Material Top Tabs Navigator](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/material-top-tab-navigator)

- [Developer tools](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/devtools)
- [Elements Library](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/elements)
- [React Native Tab View](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/tab-view)
- [React Native Drawer Layout](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/drawer-layout)

### API reference

- [Static configuration](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/static-configuration)
- [NavigationContainer](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/navigation-container)
- [ServerContainer](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/server-container)
- [Navigator](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/navigator)
- [Group](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/group)
- [Screen](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/screen)
- [Options for screens](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/screen-options)
- [Route object reference](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/route-object)
- [Navigation object reference](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/navigation-object)
- [NavigationContext](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/navigation-context)
- [Navigation events](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/navigation-events)
- [Navigation state reference](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/navigation-state)
- [Link](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/link)

#### Hooks

- [useNavigation](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/use-navigation)
- [useRoute](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/use-route)
- [useNavigationState](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/use-navigation-state)
- [useFocusEffect](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/use-focus-effect)
- [useIsFocused](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/use-is-focused)
- [usePreventRemove](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/use-prevent-remove)
- [useRoutePath](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/use-route-path)
- [useLinkTo](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/use-link-to)
- [useLinkProps](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/use-link-props)
- [useLinkBuilder](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/use-link-builder)
- [useScrollToTop](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/use-scroll-to-top)
- [useTheme](https://reactnavigation.org/docs/use-theme)
